Text: Hey all, one of the creators of the book here. If you enjoyed the read run out to your local comic store and buy one! Help support the indie community and spread the word if you enjoy the book! Thanks.

Hi Mi100,

I made this account to say I really enjoyed this first issue and I've already told some of my friends about it, albeit was at the gym and we were running, but I will not be detered! 

I have the first physical issue and the upcoming physical copies pre-ordered. Thanks for a great book and happy holidays!
That's awesome UniPeter! Thanks so much for the support.
